title: Introducing: Jude Shuma
content:
Actually found out about Chicago’s Jude Shuma through band of the moment, Bully; whilst playing some tracks on their Soundcloud, I noticed a single ‘like’ from their profile, on a track by Shuma. (Hey, it might have come from management/label etc. but that’s besides the point) Sporting some psychedelic, Tame Impala vibes, his two tracks to date, Subterranean Feelings and Wandering are engrossing and captivating compositions; definitely one to watch out for.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
